# Library Management System - Next.js Full Stack App

## Project Overview
Complete full-stack Library Management System with REST APIs built using Next.js 14, TypeScript, Prisma ORM, and SQLite.

## Features
- Book management (CRUD operations)
- Member management (CRUD operations)
- Borrowing system (check out, return books, track due dates)
- REST API routes for all operations
- Professional UI with Tailwind CSS

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Prisma ORM
- SQLite Database
- Tailwind CSS
